channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Mark and Lauren get the help of experts to design dream dens for children. Ten-year-old Ben can't get enough of his beloved train set! At the moment though, he shares his bedroom with his four-year-old sister, who turns everything into a train wreck! With no space for his ever-expanding track, Ben is desperate for a den in his garden with space for his dream layout to help keep his trains running on time.
